quotes.quote: Try not to become a man of success, but rather try to become a man of value.
Manhood is defined and decided by the ability to nurture and to protect, by the capability to provide and to sustain.
Being a real man doesn't mean you sleep with 100 girls, It means you fight for one girl even when 99 others are chasing you.
A real man ain't a coward, he stands by what he says, admits his faults, and corrects his mistakes.
If you're a man, you don't cry about it, you take life, the ups and downs; if you're a real man you never go down, you just stay up!
A real man never stops trying to show a girl how much he cares, even if he already has her.
The greatness of a man is not in how much wealth he acquires, but in his integrity and his ability to affect those around him positively.
It takes a real man to make a true confession - a Chocolate Soldier will excuse or cloak his sin.
Nearly all men can stand adversity, but if you want to test a man's character, give him power.
The highest reward for man's toil is not what he gets for it but what he becomes by it
Boys will break your heart. Real men will pick up the pieces.
To be a man is, precisely, to be responsible.
A man should be able to hear, and to bear, the worst that could be said of him.
A real man does not think of victory or defeat. He plunges recklessly towards an irrational death.
In every real man a child is hidden that wants to play.
A real man is one who fears the death of his heart, not of his body.
Do not go about complaining how hard it is to live in this world. such behavior is entirely unworthy of a real man.
You have to be a man before you can be a gentleman.
Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
Let men see, let them know, a real man, who lives as he was meant to live.
Only a real man is able to stick to just one woman and treat her special, always.
The stronger a man is, the more gentle he can afford to be
A man who doesn't spend time with his family can never be a real man.
The real man smiles in trouble, gathers strength from distress, and grows brave by reflection.
The real man is one who always finds excuses for others, but never excuses himself.
A real man Provides, Protects, and always keeps a Promise.
A real man is one who rejects passivity, accepts responsibility, leads courageously, and expects the greater reward, God's reward.
A real man protects your heart, he doesn't play with it.
Real men don't dance to other people's tune, instead, they play for others to dance.
Real Men stay faithful. They don't have time to look for other women because they're too busy looking for ways to love their own.
